nodes.text: The Kintan Kingdom was the name given to a region of the Nikto Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The area was named for the Kintan Kings, a criminal gang that controlled the Nikto Sector.
The Kintan Kingdom appears as part of the Nikto Sector on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
